oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martínez Faure, Raúl
Artigas Mayayo, Ana
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A research on the influence of the Official Schools of Language curriculum on the materials used in the English class
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of this paper is to evaluate the changes the 2007 curriculum generated in Official Schools of Aragon, paying specific attention to the use of different materials in class.
